title: Should we include the interest money when calculating zakat? - Assim al Hakeem
transcript: Claire when I started my job my dad opened my interest account after his death I changed that to interest-free account am i sinful for having interest for so many years and for the card calculation should I - disinterest first then calculates a card for the remaining money you're not allowed to keep the interest money so being included in the zakat is out of the question so you have to calculate how much interest was added to your money and take it out and give it to the poor and needy as form of cleansing your wealth and not as a form of making adjure or so AB through it Shakalaka share
